description:
If Ryo`s face is made public by reporter camerawoman Yoko, it`ll be all over for the City Hunter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: So ist die Liebe, so ist der Krieg - Teil 1
Target wa Ryou! Focus Lady wa Kiken ga Daisuki! (Zenpen)
The Target is Ryo! The Camerawoman Loves Danger! (Part 1)
標的(ターゲット)は獠! 激写美人(フォーカスレディ)は危険が大好き! (前編)
